Articles.Content:
TO WHO IT MAY CONCERN

So, I have found the solution to this. But I will tell you the story

I play in RSS/RO in 1.10.1 and when I opened my save to launch a Soyuz, the shaders and the terrain were going crazy, I was thinking it was parallax doing all this craziness, so I decided that I would un-Install parallax, so I did, but it was still going insane, so then I realized that my FAR icon was blank, so I thought to myself that It may be FAR doing all this trouble, that's bc it was, I installed the wrong version for FAR, I uninstalled FAR, and grabbed the compatible version, so yay for me I guess
